title: What makes weather?
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and David Jay
brief_description: Explains the concepts and terminology of weather forecasting. Uses time-lapse cinematography to show cloud formations and topical influences, and live-action experiments and animation to illustrate unequal heating and the resulting effects of cold and warm air masses.
